programme.title: Play To Win
programme.desc: "Play To Win" pits a group of contestants from around the world against one another for a chance to compete for a life-changing job or a six-figure coaching opportunity with the HIGDON GROUP.

programme.title: Help Wanted
programme.desc: HELP WANTED is the story of an immigrant mechanic stuck in a middle-age malaise who learns to re-appreciate his life through the eyes of a confident new employee.

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - How Often Do Men Think About Sex?
programme.desc: How often do men really think about sex? Plus, we talk about ways to maintain intimacy when you're both the caretaker and the lover.

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - Fake Orgasms: Bad for Women & Men
programme.desc: Alcohol may help get you in the mood but how does it affect your sex life? And do men fake orgasms? All this and more on Sex Talk with Dr. Lia.

programme.title: Sex Talk
programme.sub-title: Sex Talk - A Satisfying Sex Life as You Age
programme.desc: Age and orgasms - how to stay satisfied when your body won't cooperate. Plus, is everyone else really having more sex than you are? This and more on Sex Talk with Dr. Lia.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: Live Above Fear with George Kalantzis & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: Life’s hardest lessons often come with the greatest gifts, as our guest George Kalantzis has learned. From substance abuse, to single fatherhood, to a near death experience, he’s navigated the toughest transitions and shares what he’s learned.

programme.title: The Rising Man Podcast
programme.sub-title: Fatherhood Jam: Be A Values Driven Man with Jeff King & Phil Gomez & Jeddy Azuma
programme.desc: Fatherhood skills are vital no matter your current parental status. The core principles apply across life’s domains, from setting clear values to communicating needs. This conversation highlights the benefits of shared vision and clear agreements.

programme.title: The Mindsetters
programme.sub-title: Guests Vito Papariello and Rodney Allgood
programme.desc: Its is time for the gentlemen to chime in and give their perspective on Love vs Lust.

programme.title: The Mindsetters
programme.sub-title: Guests Ashley Nichols and Meghan Buckley
programme.desc: Guest Ashley Nichols and Coach Meghan Buckley discuss with host Coach Lorraine Lindsey and Co Host Carmen Smith Relationship Patterns

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.sub-title: Which Diet Trends are Most Effective?
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll be breaking down several popular diets and eating routines and looking at the different effects they can have on your body.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll be looking at some of the top health and wellness issues affecting children and adolescents in 2022, including diabetes, long COVID, and mental health.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll talk with health experts about the importance of sleep, sharing different techniques and tips that can improve your sleep schedule and help you to wake up each morning feeling rested and refreshed.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll talk with a group of nurses about their experiences dealing with increased workplace violence and harassment during the COVID-19 pandemic. We’ll also go over the effects of COVID-19 and irregular sleep patterns on depression in children and adults.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll talk with the chair of last year’s American Heart Association Scientific Sessions on new diet guidelines and programs to combat health inequity. We’ll also share tips on improving your heart health and identifying potential symptoms of heart damage and disease.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll talk with several experts on the often stigmatized topic of sexual intimacy among older adults. We’ll also share information on how seniors can slow the spread of Parkinson’s disease, deal with symptoms of menopause, and reduce their risk of Alzheimer’s.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll cover common public health issues caused by smog, pollen, and other environmental hazards. We’ll also discuss how to avoid Lyme disease, West Nile virus, and sinusitis.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll speak with experts on how the lack of accessibility to basic healthcare has affected people around the country, as well as what steps can be taken to ensure greater health equity.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll talk with a former cancer patient who was treated with psilocybin about his experiences, as well as a psychiatry professor who has spent decades researching the effects of medical hallucinogens.

programme.title: HealthDay
programme.desc: In this episode, we’ll be discussing the dangers of drug abuse and addiction, speaking with doctors and survivors of opioid abuse on the factors behind the recent spike in addiction across the country.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 8 Harmony Janu Sirasana
programme.desc: Invite the mind into harmony as you take it nice and easy with today’s posture, Janu Sirsasana.

programme.title: OmStars- Yoga Is Series
programme.sub-title: Yoga Is - Day 9 Kindness Marichasana A
programme.desc: Invite kindness into your body, using Marichasana A as a framework for integrating tenderness into your practice.

programme.title: Good Morning Joy
programme.sub-title: Good Morning Joy - Following The Light Inside
programme.desc: 3x GRAMMY winner, J. Ivy, shares his transformation from a shy kid to a spoken word powerhouse. J. Ivy performs. Plus, a story about a bus driver who made a first grader's day, street interviews from NYC, and Daaji discusses the soul's evolution.

programme.title: Good Morning Joy
programme.sub-title: Good Morning Joy - Power of Positivity
programme.desc: Social media personality Bruce W. Brackett details his triumph over addiction and trauma giving hope to all facing challenges. Plus, head to Rhode Island for a heartwarming tale where students make dreams come true for a security guard.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.desc: Host Lisa Garr interviews Spring Washam

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show - Finding Inner Courage
programme.desc: Having a tough time lately? Join host Lisa Garr as she speaks with beloved poet, teacher, and storyteller, Mark Nepo. Today Mark shares his insight from his latest work, “The Book of the Soul” and shares how crisis can wake us up to opportunity. Info: marknepo.com.

programme.title: The Aware Show
programme.sub-title: The Aware Show - Power of Healing
programme.desc: Join Lisa Garr as she speaks with millennial Author, Speaker, & Inspirational Entertainer Justin Michael Williams about the true power of healing. Justin discusses creating a future of inclusion and diversity while using music and meditation to spread his message of waking up the world! Info: justinmichaelwilliams.com.

programme.title: Unsupersize Us
programme.desc: Unsupersize Us follows director Juan-Carlos Asse takes five people from his hometown that suffer from common health issues and puts them on a regimen of a plant based diet and exercise, changing their lives forever.

programme.title: Life Stories with Marc Hoberman
programme.desc: Writer Stan Zimmerman (Golden Girls, Gilmore Girls, Roseanne, A Very Brady Sequel and more) talks about his incredible Hollywood journey. Stan also discusses the dangers of bullying.
